### R-Govys Contacts

**Wendy Martinez** is a Senior Mathematical Statistician for Data Science at the U.S. Census Bureau. [Webpage](https://www.linkedin.com/in/martinez-wendy-483b0112/)

**E. Eli Holmes** is a research scientist with NOAA Fisheries. She is an applied mathematician who works on algorithms for multivariate state-space analysis of time series data. She is active in R and open-science training in NOAA Fisheries. [Webpage](https://eeholmes.github.io) [GitHub](https://github.com/eeholmes)

**Donna LaLonde** is Director of Strategic Initiatives and Outreach at the American Statistical Association [Webpage](https://www.linkedin.com/in/donna-lalonde-she-her-a6a41124/)
